channel.title: Irc-The way i did it
channel.description:
Hi guys
I was trying to connect to the irc channel and had a bit of trouble (im a newbie what ya expect) so i thought i would share what i did might help some one else
here gos:
Hexchat
open it
user Information: i filled this out
Networks: Tap add button then i typed irc.0x00sec.org i then tap the edit buttuon
Servers tab: tap add and type irc.0x00sec.org/6697 Autojoin channels i added #site-feedback:announcements
Tick the following: use ssl for all the servers on this network use global user information Network
Login method: custom....(onnect commands)
Then connect
In the chat bar add the following type this /msg NickServ register (password gos here) no brackets either lol
You then add this in to the bar yes type it ``` /msg NickServ identify (password gos here) without the brackets
Now add this /join #0x00sec enter
If i have anything wrong pleas correct, this is the way i have got it to work
and not last or least the max respect gos to the one and only
dtm- gave up some time to help a new dumb ass nice one bro:sunglasses:

item.title: Irc-The way i did it
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: Irc-The way i did it
item.dc:creator: fxbg
item.description:
how I did it…

sudo apt-get -y install irssi

then I

(xenial)sunjester@localhost:/var/www/html# irssi -c irc.0x00sec.org

then I

/join #0x00sec

Read full topic

item.title: Irc-The way i did it
item.dc:creator: Tanita1
item.description:
Hi guys

I was trying to connect to the irc channel and had a bit of trouble (im a newbie what ya expect) so i thought i would share what i did might help some one else

here gos:

Hexchat

open it

user Information: i filled this out

Networks:
Tap add button then i typed irc.0x00sec.org
i then tap the edit buttuon

Servers tab:
tap add and type irc.0x00sec.org/6697
Autojoin channels i added #site-feedback:announcements

Tick the following:
use ssl for all the servers on this network
use global user information
Network

Login method:
custom…(onnect commands)

Then connect

In the chat bar add the following type this
/msg NickServ register (password gos here) no brackets either lol

You then add this in to the bar yes type it ```
/msg NickServ identify (password gos here) without the brackets

Now add this /join #0x00sec enter

If i have anything wrong pleas correct, this is the way i have got it to work

and not last or least the max respect gos to the one and only

dtm- gave up some time to help a new dumb ass nice one bro:sunglasses:

Read full topic
